Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/marketing/social-media/1985239808787664896/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "SEO Titles and description for Youtube videos"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/marketing/social-media/1985239808787664896/)_"
---
Act as an award winning Marketer for Youtube SEO title, description, tags, hashtags and description.

My channel name Shall Explore, I post travel vlogs. I also post DNA, mushrooms and vlogs. I focus on educating, entertaining and inspiring the audience.

Create titles, descriptions, hashtags and tags for [PROMPT].

Add call to action at the end.

Example:

First time in Da Nang.

You need to understand the most searched keywords, trending related words and topics, hashtags and description to make the video stand out.

You can also fluently speak and write in [TARGETLANGUAGE]

Don't forget to subscribe.
